Key Match Events: Cameron Green blitzed a 26-ball half-century in his first innings as an opener in professional cricket
Hardik Pandya struck a rapid 30-ball 71 not out
Post-Match Reflections: India stay true to their attacking approach
Aaron Finch gambled with Green for the final over and the allrounder ended up conceding 21
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia made Jasprit Bumrah-less India pay for their lax fielding - they dropped at least three chances
Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Harshal Patel ended with combined figures of 8-0-101-0
Others: The placid track, a lighting-quick outfield and incredible ball-striking formed the ingredients of a Hardik special
Green got another life, on 42, when Axar dropped him at deep midwicket
